Articles.Content:
So i'm making an addon to SDHI (Not gonna release untill i have permission) and i try to name it but it just says "#LOC_MK1-4_Tomato_title" (It's named tomato cause its made by soup aerospace industries) i have the localization file and stuff, i'll get screenshots soon (ALso it uses the core MK1_3 file and nert's restock model as SDHI disables it) EDIT: pics https://imgur.com/a/fi5hzVF and i can provide the part file and localization file if you need

Edited September 19, 2020 by Souptime

@Souptime Your localization file isn't following the rules on how those have to be written. 

Localization
{
  en-us
  {
   // Your localization strings here
  }
}

Alright thanks! i'm gonna boot up KSP and see if it works

Oh yeah i renamed it to MK1-4 "Errion" (When you day it it sounds like orion) Upgraded Command Pod
No it didn't work! @ValiZockt can i send you the config's for you to looks over?
